t:
sleep, but some unexplained noise makes it hard to get some.
To see an end to it, I had a security camera installed in my bedroom to watch me while I sleep.

The security footage just showed a disembodied head staring into the camera for hours.
c:
Who watches you while you sleep?


#Collab and share what do you #waitfor every night. #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#sleep #noise #camera #disembodied #head
